sentences.english: Organize and Formulate Post-Disaster Production and Reconstruction Program.
sentences.chinese: 组织制定灾后生产重建规划。

sentences.english: Fourth, we should further strengthen cooperation in disaster prevention and mitigation, and post-disaster reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 第四，进一步加强防灾减灾和灾后重建合作。

sentences.english: A total of 108 billion yuan has been earmarked to finance post-earthquake recovery and reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 地震灾后恢复重建资金1080亿元。

sentences.english: The images reveal a city still very much coping with the aftermath of the disaster.
sentences.chinese: 图片显示了这座城市仍然承受着严重的灾后余波。

sentences.english: This intervention post-disaster is now well known.
sentences.chinese: 这种灾后干预是众所周知的。

sentences.english: This is the new idea in the work of post-disaster restoration and reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 这也是灾后恢复重建工作的新思路。

sentences.english: Now, this rescue and recovery effort will be complex and challenging.
sentences.chinese: 此次救灾和灾后重建工作将非常复杂，极具挑战。

sentences.english: WBR to take positive measures to post-disaster reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: WBR采取积极的措施进行灾后重建。

sentences.english: Fiscal and taxation policies were implemented to support disaster relief and post-earthquake recovery and reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 实施支持抗震救灾和灾后恢复重建的财税政策。

sentences.english: Clearly, the need to fund an additional supplementary budget for disaster reconstruction is fueling these worries some more.
sentences.chinese: 显然，灾后重建的额外追加预算带来更多的忧虑。

sentences.english: They start in a small town in the forest of Elwynn, which has regrown since enemies destroyed it in the first Warcraft.
sentences.chinese: 他们起始于艾尔文森林的一个灾后重建的小城镇中。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the general theory problem of post-disaster recovery of urban earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了城市地震灾后恢复的一般理论问题。

sentences.english: How should we motivate general publics in disaster-affected area to participate in reconstruction?
sentences.chinese: 如何调动基层人民参与灾后重建的积极性。

sentences.english: The Bank of Japan is not going to tighten, especially after the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 地震灾后的日本银行，实施了从紧的货币政策。

sentences.english: In one quake-hit area, work had already turned to reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 有些地震灾区已经展开了灾后重建的工作。

sentences.english: In post-disaster Haiti, the welfare of the animal population is of vital importance.
sentences.chinese: 在灾后的海地，救济动物是至关重要的一件事。

definition: disaster-stricken/to be hit by a natural calamity
to relieve disaster/to help disaster victims
to provide relief during times of emergency and disaster (idiom)
disaster prevention/to protect against natural disasters
